content.raw:
this is being persnickety, but we don't need the RENAME clause for installing model.config on line 25 of ros/sandia_hand_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt since we aren't renaming it, just installing it.

of a more substantive nature, do we need to also include a copy of database.config, installed (as a duplicate) manifest.xml, for the same reason we need model.config and manifest.xml files?
content.html:
this is being persnickety, but we don't need the RENAME clause for installing model.config on line 25 of ros/sandia_hand_description/robots/CMakeLists.txt since we aren't renaming it, just installing it.

of a more substantive nature, do we need to also include a copy of database.config, installed (as a duplicate) manifest.xml, for the same reason we need model.config and manifest.xml files?
